attributes.action: Close non-essential The Range Stores during the COVID-19 Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: To help save lives, and protect the public health, stopping people going out for non-essential goods during the lockdown shopping at the range and mixing, putting staff and the public at risk in these stores, other business have had to close stores and I don’t see why this excludes the range.
attributes.background: Temporarily close all The Range stores during lockdown and the Covid-19 pandemic like other non-essential stores have had to.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government isn't responsible for closing indiviudal named retailers. 

If you'd like to see a change to the types of businesses that are allowed to open during the lockdown, you could start or sign a petition calling for that to happen, such as this one:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311765
